kenya.name: Kenya
kenya.climate: Tropical coast, arid interior, temperate highlands
kenya.speciality: Big Five safaris, Great Rift Valley, vibrant cultures
kenya.culture: Home to diverse tribes including Maasai and Kikuyu; rich music, dance, and crafts.

essentialTips.title: Park Rules
essentialTips.note: Keep safe distances and follow ranger instructions.

essentialTips.title: Payments
essentialTips.note: Cards accepted in cities; carry cash on safari.

faqs.q: Do I need a yellow fever certificate?
faqs.a: Recommended when arriving from endemic regions; check latest rules.
July to October in the Masai Mara.
